data.title: Germany Cities Database
data.meta_description: A database of 129 prominent cities in Germany.  Includes a city's latitude, longitude, state and other variables of interest. MIT license.  CSV, Excel and JSON formats. Comprehensive database available.
data.text:
Below is a list of 129 prominent cities in Germany. Each row includes a city's latitude, longitude, state and other variables of interest. This is a subset of all 75,444 places in Germany (and only some of the fields) that you'll find in our World Cities Database. We're releasing this data subset for free under an MIT license. You're free to use the data below for personal or commercial applications. The data below can be downloaded in .csv, .json, and .xlsx formats.

Notable Cities: The capital of Germany is Berlin, which is in the state of Berlin. The largest city in Germany is Berlin, with an urban population of 4,890,363.
